pr_title: Add Appnexus currency support from exchange response

timeline.message: Add Appnexus currency support from exchange response

timeline.bodyText:
Mb let's check for null and set DEFAULT_CURRENCY if there are no cur from response, to be more clear. (+ last sentence in ticket).
(I know that we later will be using USD if null)
timeline.author: DGarbar

replies.bodyText: We don't really need to do this since currency service already cares in org.prebid.server.currency.CurrencyConversionService#convertCurrency.
replies.author: rpanchyk
